name: The Tome of the Ccaizhdi
description:
This text-adventure goes beyond dungeons and traps. Not only will you face deadly traps at every turn, but in order to survive you will have to learn the ancient language of the Ccaizhdi peoples.

If you want to suceed, you must keep the Ccaizhdi language alive.

Meet the Authors:

  • idyllicmind--Story, puzzle design
  • Jeffrey Sardina--code, image sourcing

Images were sourced from public domain databases. See assets/images/credits.txt for more info on image sourcing.

A few notes:

  • Images in the game are taken from public domain sources (see credits.txt in the images folder).
  • The Mac and Linux distributions currently do not work; fix pending

Cover Image: a large tree in the middle of a forest, with the words ‘The Tome of the Ccaizhdi’ witten above its branches.
